amendment.description: To continue providing 33 percent of the Global Fund's revenue and to contribute an additional $566,000,000 to the Global Fund for fiscal year 2007 to support grant renewals and new proposals to support international HIV/AIDS, tuberculosis, and malaria programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3052 proposed by Senator Santorum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3052 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
